title Sequenece Diagram: 01 Create Account(Creating an Organiser Account) - Basic course of events
actor "Administrator" as u
image data:image/png;base64, "Web Browser" as w
boundary "<link:_>newView : View " as nv
boundary "<link:_>: DispatchServlet" as d
entity "<link:_>m : Model" as m

control "<link:_>: AccountController" as ac
entity "<link:_>o : Organiser" as c
participant "<link:_>: OrganiserRepository" as ar
participant "<link:_>: AccountService" as as

==1. The administrator selects the create account functionality==
note over w,d:This part of the functionality is completed in JavaScript\nIt does not need to be shown here
==2. The system displays an input form to get the required details (details required are based on the type of account being created) **(05-create-account)**\n3. The administrator enters the details of the account==
u -> w: click()
activate w

w->d:POST(url : String, data : JSON)
activate d

d->ac:createOrganiser(email : String, name : String, password : String, address: String, companyName: String, phoneNumber: String, m : Model)
activate ac
ac->as: createOrganiserAccount(email : String, name : String, password : String, address: String, companyName: String, phoneNumber: String)
activate as
as->ar:null := findAccountByEmail(email:String)



as -> *c:Organiser(email : String, name : String, password : String, address: String, CompanyName: String, phoneNumber: String)
activate c
c--> as:return o
deactivate c


as->ar:save(o : Organiser)


as-->ac:return Error.NONE
deactivate as

ac->as:acc:= getAccount(email:string)
activate as
as->ar:acc := findAccountByEmail(email:String)
as-->ac:return acc
deactivate as

ac->m: addAttribute("account" : String, acc : Account)

ac-->d:return **"02-main-customer"
deactivate ac
d->*nv:View(model : Model)
activate nv


nv-->d:
deactivate nv

d-->w:return newView
deactivate d

==4. The system displays the main page of the system **(02-main-organiser)**==
